title: No Dogs Allowed
description:
Our intern Hayden has a bit of a problem. She’s returning to school soon and her new roommate brought her dog without asking.
Her old roommate is pursuing her career and won’t be roommates with Hayden this year, so she puts out an ad for a new roommate to replace her.
Hayden is a clean freak and doesn’t like dog hair, so she was sure to disclosed in the ad her disinterest for a roommate with a dog. However, the new roommate applies anyway and sends a photo of her dog to Hayden hoping she’ll be ok with it. “Hey, I’m going to be your roommate…here’s my dog!”
Hayden never had any roommate issues before, so she’s uncertain how she should go about addressing the elephant in the room. She doesn’t want to ruin a possible friendship or cause tension within the apartment, but she does want to set a few boundaries.
What should Hayden do? How should address the issue?
